import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form,Button,Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { saveShippingAddress } from "../actions/cartAction" import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; const ShippingScreen = (props) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart const dispatch = useDispatch() const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const[city,setCity]=useState(shippingAddress.city) const[postalCode,setPostalCode]=useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const [state, setStates] = useState(shippingAddress.state) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log({address,city,postalCode,state,country}) dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address,city,postalCode,state,country})) props.history.push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)}> City setCity(e.target.value)}> PostalCode setPostalCode(e.target.value)}> State setStates(e.target.value)}> Country setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default ShippingScreen
